info.brief_description: Joker is dead, Harley is bored.. And decides she wants a new toy
info.description:
The joker has been dead for the past two years, and Harley Quinn has gotten very bored. She decided she needed something to help her get over the death of her beloved joker... So she has decided to enslave you!


A few quick rules:

Please, please, please, use proper grammar, spelling and punctuation as much as possible.


No shrinking. You must be full sized at all times.


Harley has to be cruel at all times.


You never start to enjoy it.


Alright, that's about it.. Go crazy!
